title: Sonja Reid (OMGitsfirefoxx)
description:
Sonja Reid does a lot of very cool things. She is a gamer, Twitch broadcaster, car enthusiast, and podcaster. She's in the Gamers Guinness World Records and she's on a YouTube show with Conan O'Brien. After meeting her at the Radford launch, we knew we had to get her on the show and she didn't disappoint. We talk about her love of cars, the hilarious successor to her first car, searching for her dad's dream car, track days, SEMA, and more. 

In 2017, Sonja was named "Most followed female videogames broadcaster on Twitch" in the 2017 Guinness World Records Gamer's Edition, and the fourth most influential gamer in the world by Forbes.  Recorded on Nov. 15, 2021

Check out her Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/omgitsfirefoxx

Twitter: @OMGitsfirefoxx

IG: @OMGitsfirefoxx

Head to the Luxury Driver Amazon page for 15% off your order of their incredible wipes. 

Just head on over to Stance.com and pick out some styles you think they might like.

Start your free trial today at egnyte.com.

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

For our listeners, they are offering 20% off your first purchase. Get yourself some of the most comfortable and versatile clothing on the planet at vuori.com/TIRE
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Sonja Reid, OMGitsfirefoxx)
